articles.description: Paddy McGuiness has opened up about the torment he has suffered at the hands of cruel internet trolls after the breakdown of his marriage to model wife Christine McGuinness
articles.content:
Top Gear host Paddy McGuinness has admitted to suffering after being bombarded with abuse on social media following his split from wife Christine McGuinness. 
 The popular comedian - who was back on… [+2906 chars]
